paper_abstract: In this paper, the structural, sensor, and actuator mathematical models of a transelevator are presented; after, the mathematical model with sensor and actuator of the transelevator is obtained by using the combination of the above mentioned mathematical models. The proposed mathematical model is validated comparing the simulation results against the experimental results. Finally, the stability analysis of the aforementioned model is studied.
paper_title: Mathematical model with sensor and actuator for a transelevator
